message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $20,000. I think it will be very valuable for you, and this is a fair price.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $15,000 for it. Could we possibly come to an agreement closer to that amount?
Bob, I understand your position, but $20,000 is already a competitive price. How about we meet in the middle at $17,500?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I still believe that $15,000 would be a fair price for this product. Would you be able to meet me halfway?
